4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

color-palette?

Generic function

Summary

Returns #t if the stream or medium supports color.

Signature

color-palette? palette => boolean

Arguments

palette
An instance of type <palette>.

Values

boolean
An instance of type <boolean>.

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

Returns #t if the stream or medium supports color.

See also

<color>, page 132

color?, page 135

color-ihs, page 135

color-luminosity, page 136

color-rgb, page 138
